form.name: aspnetForm

li.p: Governor Doug Ducey and Superintendent of Public Instruction, Kathy Hoffman, announced the closure of all Arizona schools for the remainder of the 2019/2020 school year due to the outbreak of the COVID-19 virus.

BFCS is committed to providing ongoing guidance and resources as we sort through this unprecedented situation together. Please visit the following page for additional information and resources: https://www.bfcsaz.com/Content/covid-19-updates

span.p: Governor Doug Ducey and Superintendent of Public Instruction, Kathy Hoffman, announced the closure of all Arizona schools for the remainder of the 2019/2020 school year due to the outbreak of the COVID-19 virus.

div.p: We're glad that you are interested in our school! Due to the current closure of schools in Arizona, we are excited to be able to connect with families remotely and offer a video tour of our campus as well as provide additional information and resources you would normally receive during an in-person tour.

h4.strong: Please select the campus you are interested in, complete the form, and a staff member will be in touch soon!

ul.li: Benjamin Franklin High School (7-12), Germann & Rittenhouse

p.span: Let's find out how we can best help you. Simply answer the question below and follow the link to whichever answer is the most accurate for you.

span.strong: Are you ready to make the decision and enroll your child in our school?

td.a: Take me to the Pre-Enrollment Application so that I can enroll my student in your school.

p.a: I would like to learn more about your school and program before enrolling my child.

span.span: The mission of Benjamin Franklin Charter School is to offer a well-rounded education with proven superior academics, exceptional programs, time-honored values, and a high level of parental participation.
Benjamin Franklin Charter School, Educating Arizona...One Student at a Time
